hero.title: Welcome to
hero.description: Your expert for sustainable renovation, refurbishment and modernization of residential and commercial properties. As a competent construction management service provider for smooth and efficient implementation of your construction projects. From the first idea to final completion, we offer comprehensive consulting and management services: We develop customized concepts, coordinate experienced craftsmen and monitor the entire construction process to ensure the highest quality, sustainability and efficiency.

services.title: Services
services.heading: Our Services
services.description: With our customized service modules – project management, project leadership and project controlling – we offer comprehensive support for smooth project execution. As your dedicated construction management team, we take on project-specific tasks – whether through expert consultation or by taking on central steering and control functions. We handle the challenges so you can focus entirely on transforming your property.

projects.description: Soon we will present our exciting projects here

paragraphs.1: ReNova GmbH was founded in 2024 and is a specialized service provider for construction management and renovation project management. With extensive experience in international markets such as the Middle East (Dubai), Turkey, and now Germany, we bring a global perspective to every project.
paragraphs.2: In addition to our core services, we are experts in technical due diligence, sustainable renovation management (ESG), customized user solutions, as well as project consulting, training, and coaching.
paragraphs.3: We offer a comprehensive range of services for the renovation and real estate industry, including project management, construction supervision, and project controlling. Our work is based on three core values: teamwork, customer-oriented solutions, and innovation.
paragraphs.4: At ReNova GmbH, we don't just manage projects – we shape transformations with precision, efficiency, and the highest quality. Let's realize your renovation vision together.
